text: Oleg Aleksandrovich Strizhenov (10 August 1929 â€“ 9 February 2025) was a Soviet and Russian actor. He was known for his roles in The Gadfly, The Mexican, The Forty-First, Pardesi, The Captain's Daughter, White Nights, and The Queen of Spades. Strizhenov died at a Moscow hospital on 9 February 2025, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Oleg Strizhenov
